thread.title: Gifts from Grandma: The good, the bad, the ugly (32 Photos)
thread.title_full: Gifts from Grandma: The good, the bad, the ugly (32 Photos)

author: Sebastian
title: Gifts from Grandma: The good, the bad, the ugly (32 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
When my birthday comes around (June 1st for anyone that’s curious) I always get something from Grandma in the mail. It’s the most anticipated gift in my handful of presents I receive, usually consisting of gift cards and cash, but for some unexplained reason, they leave me surprised every time. I guess this can be said for more than just myself as you’ll soon see. If you have something to share, as always post it in the comments section below, this way I can laugh with you. 2
